com.kuka.med.robotstate

Interface IRobotState


  • public interface IRobotState
    Capability interface to receive events if the state of the serial kinematic (robot) changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRobotStateListener(IRobotStateListener listener)
      Adds listener, which will be informed about any change of the robotState.
      com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.StatePortState getDeviceState()
      Get the device state.
      List<EFailedConditionForNormalUse> getFailedConditionsForNormalUse()
      This method checks the conditions for normal use of the robot and returns a list of failed ones.

      This method checks the conditions for normal use of the robot.
      void removeRobotStateListener(IRobotStateListener listener)
      Removes listener.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceState

        com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.StatePortState getDeviceState()
        Get the device state.
        Returns:
        the device state

      • isReadyForNormalUse

        boolean isReadyForNormalUse()
        This method checks the conditions for normal use of the robot. The method returns true if all conditions are met, i.e. that the method getFailedConditionsForNormalUse() returns no EFailedConditionForNormalUse.
        Returns:
        true, if the robot is ready for normal use

      • getFailedConditionsForNormalUse

        List<EFailedConditionForNormalUse> getFailedConditionsForNormalUse()
        This method checks the conditions for normal use of the robot and returns a list of failed ones. The checked conditions are:
        • the robot is ready to move;
        • operation mode is AUT;
        • boot state is Ready;
        • device state is OK;
        • all axes are mastered;
        • all axes are GMS referenced;
        • all axes are position referenced.
        Returns:
        array with the failed conditions for normal use (array is empty if no conditions failed)
        See Also:
        EFailedConditionForNormalUse

      • addRobotStateListener

        void addRobotStateListener(IRobotStateListener listener)
        Adds listener, which will be informed about any change of the robotState.
        Parameters:
        listener - IRobotStateListener
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is null.
        See Also:
        removeRobotStateListener(IRobotStateListener)

      • removeRobotStateListener

        void removeRobotStateListener(IRobotStateListener listener)
        Removes listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - IRobotStateListener
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is null.
        See Also:
        addRobotStateListener(IRobotStateListener)
